diff_hunk:
@@ -4,6 +4,16 @@ def self.season
     Season.current
   end
 
+  def self.switcher(phase)
+    @phases = {
+        'Proposals' => :fake_proposals_phase,
+        'Application' => :fake_application_phase,
+        'CodingSummer' => :fake_coding_phase,
+        'Real Time' => :back_to_reality
+    }
+     self.send @phases[phase]
body: It's better to use `public_send`. `Object#send` will also call private methods which is ok (but arguably still dangerous) in certain meta-programming contexts. We want to enforce the public API here.
body_html: It's better to use public_send. Object#send will also call private methods which is ok (but arguably still dangerous) in certain meta-programming contexts. We want to enforce the public API here.
body_text: It's better to use public_send. Object#send will also call private methods which is ok (but arguably still dangerous) in certain meta-programming contexts. We want to enforce the public API here.
